item.title: Changing difficulty
item.dc:creator: Fnoigy
item.description:
Right before you’re about to go to the next map (if you haven’t been there before)
skill #
The number is between 1 and 3, 1 being easy, 2 being medium, and 3 being sausagefest.
When you change over to the new map, it SHOULD change the difficulty. To check, type “skill” into the console, and if it gives you the same number you entered before, it worked. If it gives the number corresponding to the one it was already at, then it didn’t and yea you’ll probably have to just start over.
